explains: adv. 特别；尤其；古怪地；奇怪地

sentences.en: These plants are peculiarly prone to disease.
sentences.cn: 这些植物特别容易发生病变。

sentences.en: After the thing had closed with a peculiarly afflicting sermon the applause was enthusiastic.
sentences.cn: 在一个特别令人难受的冗长讲话结束后，热烈的掌声响起。

sentences.en: His face had become peculiarly expressionless.
sentences.cn: 他的脸变得异乎寻常地毫无表情。
